# Task: Project Setup

> **Task Number**: 01 | **Dependencies**: None | **Autonomy Level**: high

## Objective
Initialize the project repository, set up development environment, and configure build tools and dependencies.

## Rules Compliance
Follow project setup best practices including version control, dependency management, and build automation.

## Context
This task establishes the development environment for the todo app. Proper setup ensures all team members can build and run the project consistently and reduces environment-related issues.

## Requirements
- Initialize project repository with proper structure
- Configure build tools and scripts
- Set up development dependencies
- Create initial project documentation (README, CONTRIBUTING)
- Configure code quality tools (linters, formatters)

## Implementation Steps

### 1. Initialize Repository
Create project repository with appropriate .gitignore, README, and LICENSE files. Set up branching strategy and commit guidelines.

### 2. Configure Build System
Set up build tools, scripts, and automation. Ensure one-command build and test execution.

### 3. Development Environment
Document environment setup steps including required tools, versions, and configuration.

## Definition of Done
- [x] Repository initialized with proper structure
- [x] Build system configured and tested

## Testing
- Fresh checkout builds successfully
- All team members can set up environment
- Build scripts execute without errors

## Completion Checklist
- [ ] All requirements met
- [ ] Self-review completed
- [ ] Documentation complete

## Notes
Time spent on proper setup pays dividends throughout the project. Automate as much as possible to reduce friction for new contributors.
